goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans

Class TauModule<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans.TauModule<T,A,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of term associated with the KRT that the agent to which the transition module belongs uses.
    A - The type of atom associated with the KRT that the agent to which the transition module belongs uses.
    U - The type of update associated with the KRT that the agent to which the transition module belongs uses.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrologTauModule

    public abstract class TauModule<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a transition module.
    Author:
    sungshik

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Derives<A> derives
      Represents the derives methods that this module should use.
      protected Module module
      The module corresponding to this transition module.
      protected GoalRepository<A,U> repository
      The goals that occur in this module.
      protected java.util.List<TauClass<T,A,U>> tauClasses
      The transition classes belonging to this transition module.

      • createDerives

        protected abstract Derives<A> createDerives(java.util.Collection<DatabaseFormula> knowledge)
        Creates a derives function that fits this transition module, and that uses the specified knowledge rules to make derivations.
        Parameters:
        knowledge - - The knowledge rules to instantiate the derives function with.
        Returns:

      • getClasses

        public java.util.List<TauClass<T,A,U>> getClasses()
        Gets the transition classes belonging to this transition module.

      • getActionOptions

        public OptionMap<T,A,U> getActionOptions(MentalState mentalState,
                                Debugger debugger)
        Gets the options in the given mental state. This method mimics RuleSet.getActionOptions(goal.core.mentalstate.MentalState, goal.tools.debugger.Debugger), with the addition that options are stored and returned by transition class.
        Parameters:
        ms - - The mental state to get options for.
        Returns:
        A mapping from transition classes to action options in the specified mental state.

      • getDerives

        public Derives<A> getDerives()
        Gets the derives function.
        Returns:
        The derives function associated with this transition module.

      • getRepository

        public GoalRepository<A,U> getRepository()
        Gets the goal repository.
        Returns:
        The goal respository associated with this transition module.

      • hideRule

        public void hideRule(Rule rule)
        Hides a rule from the program section of the module corresponding to this transition module such that it is no longer checked for applicability.
        Parameters:
        rule - - The rule to be hided.

      • searchTauClass

        public TauClass<T,A,U> searchTauClass(Rule rule)
        Search the transition class corresponding to the specified rule.
        Parameters:
        rule - - The rule whose corresponding transition class is to be sought.
        Returns:
        The transition class to which the rule corresponds if one exists in this transition module; null otherwise.
